Legislative History of Laws

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 6 of the Uniform Unincorporated Nonprofit Association Act (2008 Act) . See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-1106

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: An unincorporated nonprofit association may acquire, hold, encumber, or transfer in its name an interest in real or personal property.
An unincorporated nonprofit association may be a beneficiary of a trust or contract, a legatee, or a devisee.
